bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of a loss of regular flexibility of any body part with cramps and a feeling of tightness and hardening. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry tian zhong luo 田中螺：小腹急硬，小便 赤澀，脚手浮腫 , “Lower abdominal tension and hardness . Urine is red and rough. The legs and hands are swollen”. Ji zhao feng 雞爪風 , chicken‘s claw wind [1]

PC, brought forth by wind heat, of convulsions experienced by women following delivery. Xuan ming lun fang 宣明論方 3: 產後風熱搐搦，俗謂雞爪風 , “Wind heat convulsions following delivery are commonly called chicken’s claw wind ”.
